sailpoint.api
Class PolicyUtil.RoleSummary

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.api.PolicyUtil.RoleSummary
Enclosing class:
PolicyUtil
public static class PolicyUtil.RoleSummary
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a collection of application-specific entitlements, either "free" (the name is null) or associated with a role.

We provide construction utilities to collapse entitlements for the same application, attributes, and permission into the same summary objects to reduce clutter in the UI.

Field Summary
 java.util.List<PolicyUtil.ApplicationSummary> applications
          The ApplicationSummary objects for this role summary.
 java.lang.String name
          The name of the role or null if this is a "free" entitlement.

 void assimilate(java.lang.String appname, boolean permission, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Object value)
